articles.summary: Simply Wall St.: Is Lucid (LCID) Using Saudi-Backed Liquidity To Buy Time For Its Luxury EV Strategy?. Earlier this month, Lucid Group used a Nasdaq investor conference and subsequent media outreach to highlight its liquidity support from Saudi Arabiaâ€™s Public Investment Fund, expanded credit facilities, and the planned ramp-up of its Gravity SUV amid a softer luxury EV backdrop. These updates, together with new partnerships such as Uber and Nuro, awards for the Gravity and Air, and a certified pre-owned program, show Lucid leaning on financing flexibility and product breadth to offset... Related tickers mentioned: UBER.
